Purpose: To detect and quantify abnormal hemoglobin variants and assess iron status in patients suspected of thalassemia or hemoglobinopathies.
Container: EDTA (lavender-top) tube for whole blood; serum separator tube (SST) or plain red-top tube for serum
Equipment: Hemoglobin electrophoresis apparatus, HPLC system, and immunoassay/chemistry analyzers
